topic.title: Embedding a Custom Action in the Web Author Interface

keywords.indexterm: Embedding a custom action in the Web Author UI

body.p: You can control your workflow and provide custom functionality by embedding a custom action in a Web Author toolbar, contextual menu, or form control. For example, you could create an action that checks a file in or out of a file repository, or an action that marks the file as being reviewed.

To embed a custom action:
Create a plugin for Web Author.
Use the Oxygen JavaScript API to implement a custom action and add it in the Web Author interface.
